Dj4F2-BiQZ-K2HMy9kdPpw.text: I went to boondocks just the other day and had the wings and fries- they were absolutely amazing. I loved the vibe that the place gave you and the staff was beyond friendly and attentive.    definitely making this my new spot with friends :)

XD6nJ9nf7_Hs5vqsgvxc4w.text: Soooo disappointed in this place. Used to bring all my out of town friends here to escape the Entertainment District chaos, but definitely not anymore! Trust me, this place has taken a turn for the worse. My girlfriends and I were there last Sunday and (1) Service was a complete joke (2) Food came out cold (duck fries) and was definitely overpriced (3) Good luck trying to hear anything over their godawful "house" music. Seriously no idea when this started, but now they legit blast dance(?) music that can be heard up to a 10-mile radius, which then attracts all the Entertainment District trash. Real winners at Boondock's these days! This bar used to have so much potential, it USED to be unique! Now it's just the same as the others. Such a letdown - will not be coming back.

FgojPB9UUI4o75xvF7tRIA.text: I usually stay at Aloft nearby and this place is walking distance. There's always a fun looking crowd no matter what day of the week. There's a nice patio area and on Tuesdays there's a taco truck parked there. The food is good from what I've had, definitely more pub food but I enjoyed their caprese salad!

fhZ-EsUgfvxeP8dfUbx7Sw.text: Wait for the but...   Beautiful bar, so much to offer; great ambiance, pool tables, corn hole, photo booth, couches, multiple bars, covered and open air areas, live music, but... Customer service is sooooooooo slow. Less than 40 people here and 15-20 minutes f pm time of order at our table and no drinks! What? If a packed house, maybe... If they can get their service act together I'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

oNF17q4pxH3bWi-Ns8jLFA.text: The managers tried to grossly over represent our bill. So much so that we will never be returning to this shiesty representation of a bar. I hope the tab was worth it

w3eH3uAeFkKmKC4LYkIn_w.text: It's an AWESOME place! I love the pizza bites and all the beer they have there. They now are showing every Alabama game for the rest of the season, so I plan on being there ALOT!!!!! All the staff is friendly as well! ROLL TIDE!

Hoq_4iTRZE0k9ocNPwb1YA.text: My favorite spot in old town! Love all the staff they make you feel welcomed and safe no matter a weekday or the weekend. Matty with the blonde hair and tan skin is the best bartender in Scottsdale hands down! Much love for the boonies

8i6b_5J3IHVaM1k7XWr-ng.text: Boondocks is my new favorite hangout.  We were told about this place from a friend.  This place is such a fun, chill place. They had a huge patio which was nice to enjoy it before it gets over 100.  We enjoyed playing corn hole and ping pong. We would have liked to play jenga but there was only one set.  The service was eh, ok. It could have been better.  Our server went at her own pace. Took 35 minutes to get a sprite.  She brought everyone else's drink but mine. I asked (reminded) her for my sprite 2x and eventually got it.  We waited about 10 minutes for our check after asking for it.  They do have a food menu that I will try out next time.  Looking forward to coming back.

JBRPysoGlBFvUVPHIkehYA.text: Great country band on Wednesdays and lots of TVs for sports on the weekend. The pretzel is good and so are the duck fat fries. Can't wait to come back.

fzO0oGiHuEMtHSItEtCogA.text: I would never set foot in this place again. My wife and I stopped in on a Wednesday evening. The place was maybe 30% full. We seated ourselves, and waited 10 minutes before a waitress bothered to come by. The table top was filthy, and we asked if she could wipe it down and the waitress (Pink hair and lots of Tats) got a huge attitude. 10 minutes later she came back to take our dinner order, (we weren't drinking) and after taking our order demanded a credit card to open a tab. I reminded her we weren't drinking, and she said "I know, but a lot of people dine and dash, and then I m responsible!"  We eat out in Scottsdale several times a week for the past 25 years. I have never had anyone ask for a card to open a tab for dinner, again, we Were Not drinking. I was insulted by her attitude and demeanor. I walked up to her at the register, told her I was leaving, and wanted my card back. She then tried to give me someone else's credit card. What a joke. Keep on driving!!!

JMDjKKIaiZRl0YGdzbs7oA.text: So we had a group of 8 meet here for MNF/welcome back to AZ HH for a friend. I got there 10mins early & sat at the bar. Not once did I get greeted or asked if I wanted a beverage. Then my friends show up & we seat our selves in the couch section w/ a tv. We wait 20mins for a waitress (KeriAnn) to greet us & take only our drink orders. Then another 30mins goes by still with NO DRINKS yet. Finally a partial drink order makes it to our table and then the other half of our drink order makes it 15mins later. We watch the game & order food. The waitress messed up my order of shrimp & grits with shrimp ceviche, REALLY?? I also ordered the CAB sandwich (that was good) My shrimp and grits came out way after the fact that everyone was finished.  Ok-skip to the pay our tabs part....she then proceeded to charge me for the shrimp ceviche (that was more expensive then what I ordered) When I asked her about it she said "My managers busy so I couldn't cancel it out, but it's actually cheaper for you" WRONG. She finally did get the items fixed but also totally messed up on 2 other friends tabs (added drinks) and GET THIS..... Totally forgot an ENTIRE food order for someone & when asked about it she FORGOT AGAIN!!! He was served NO FOOD  the entire time we were there (3hrs)  They have a nice "game bar" concept with bags and all (that we wanted to play & drink more) but decided to relocate to The Lodge (just down the street) due to the HORRENDOUS service. I'm SAD The Lodge will be closing soon. I wish it was this place! Never will I be back here, there are way to many other great bars in the Old Town area with way better food & great service (Kelly's, LoCo Patron, RnR, Bungalow, Cold Beers & Cheeseburgers, The Lodge, Bottle Blonde) Visit them 1st so you won't be disappointed!!

Q3fEveglXJ4KUEFnWkAOaA.text: Loved this place. Lots of entertainment, bomb food, & cool atmosphere. Mac&chz- awesome, fried fish tacos -spicy, perfectly breaded & so good, boon style dog- super delicious, & the double stuffed Oreo- wicked good. Def. A place to check out!

vwruA7GWRvL4TR8QgJJQvw.text: We had a Bachelor/Bachelorette Party here last night and We had an amazing time. They were so accommodating and allowed us to decorate 5 hours earlier. We had our own private area and Brooklyn was amazing as our server. She ran around all night and never forgot us at all and her bottle service was on point! She helped set up and gave advice the whole time about what would and wouldn't work. She should receive 10 stars!!! Thank you to the whole establishment for an amazing time and treating us like family.

UY3xxloqdo2VOsEDeLTnhg.text: Was able to get the tacos today (carnitas) love this place!!! I definitely recommend coming here on country bar night!

U7_HQqWYZiN5WSSPTeWPIA.text: Came here on a Friday afternoon, and unfortunately for the restaurant, our group of 4 were the only people in the restaurant. The man working (possibly the owner or manager?) was so accommodating. It was cold out so he made sure we had heat right next to us while we played corn hole. We ordered our drinks and food and everything came out as ordered and was delicious. We each got something different and were all very happy. I hope that even though this place doesn't have 500 reviews, people will still give it a shot. Also, they have a Groupon that costs $14 for $24 worth of food!

puetAa_XAAjzFic9Vd6doQ.text: The absolute worst service I have ever received in the Phoenix/Scottsdale area. We waited over an HOUR for 3 sandwiches while the bar was fairly empty. Our server had no idea what was going on and told us it was her 2nd day but they just put her out by herself so in addition to the hour wait for food we waited 40 minutes for our checks and check out. They didn't take off a discount card we had and then the manager came back proudly saying he discounted our champagne for us- looked at the bill and his "discount" was the price of the days special!! What a joke. Please save yourself from having an awful day/night and go somewhere else

5BNEqfjf6BN2DhX2mQZGuA.text: Great food, service, and ambiance! Cool during the day or night. Definitely recommended!

y5y2PTy_RnYEwErOqwOPNQ.text: This place is wonderful! Huge open seating, loads of comfy couches and viewing spots. Amazing cocktails, and you MUST try the whiskey maple peach wings, incredible! Service is fantastic.

Y2-TDV9Jgg6BB7mNMp2tKg.text: Totally the worst bar in Scottsdale. The owners have no respect for women and the bouncers are meat head thugs. From a foodie perspective, every drink tastes watered down. You have duck fat fries but no blue cheese stuffed olives. I rather spend my money elsewhere.

dSRUnSaNufM673uFKTtLwA.text: I can only speak from a one time experience, but will go back there and hopefully update the review.  Was there for a company christmas party/get together; the patio was our location.  The atmosphere and decor is nice, fun and inviting.  The staff was polite, a manager that night was helpful with a silly price issue: the bathroom had signs of advertizing $5 shots of honey whiskey on thursdays; it was thursday and the company party didn't cover shots so we had to pay outta pocket. Ok.  I ask for one and the bartender somewhat rudely tells me "no, that price is good only until 10pm".  This is at 9:45pm!  So I told him the time & he replied "well, you are part of the party so you can not get the promotion"!!!!!!!! Wtf?  I asked for the manager, because it was silly, if I have to PAY FOR IT, who cares who I am with? Who makes this decisions? The manager wasn't all that happy to see me, looked at me and helped the situation as if I was drunk and crazy... Anyways, end of story, manager TIM gave me the shots for the $5 advertized price after mumbling some bs excuse.    Hence losing a star here.  They could've handled something so simple in a polite manner and acknowledged their mistake.  I think he said the sign was old.  Well, the shots should've been free!  But overall, the place was nice.  They have games and comfortable sofa lounging areas....  Music was decent, drinks were ok, food was not great.  Hence the second negative star!  The staff wasn't frequent with replacement of the small buffet (mac & cheese, burger which was a sad thin patty, french fries, salad, pulled beef or something, couldnt tell cause it was never there, always empty).    Two simple things, easy fixes I supposed; but the grill lost cool points with me..... Let's see what happens next time; if any. :)

y3Pam4Ky_0Vep_iCJMijqQ.text: Great service. Kat did a great job. One of my favorite spots in old town. A completely different vibe from everywhere else. Plus... buckets of beer for $15

uj5TXn6LE2ZoptO0cRh1rw.text: Boondocks is a super fun place to grab a drink or two on the weekend! I love their large outdoor space - there's plenty of tables and games to play. They also have a wide variety of specials and drinks, and a killer happy hour.   The service is good and the bartenders make strong drinks, which is always nice because a lot of the time I feel like drinks get watered down.   The food is decent! Granted, I've only had a few items (like their Mac n cheese or the fried Brussels spouts), but I've enjoyed it both times and it's better than typical bar food.  My favorite part about this is their dog-friendly patio, so be sure to bring your pups when you come!

ilLPJzfh9ZWjtmA2uOdg4g.text: First time here and was absolutely disappointed. When closing time came around, i was waiting for my friends to get their stuff and was sitting on one of the high top bar chairs when suddenly I felt not once but twice being pushed, to the point where i nearly fell off. I looked back to see who it was and it was a large, aggressive looking security guy. I know he wants to go home but come on dude is that how you get people to come back to the place?? I told him im not an animal to be pushed around and he replied "i dont care you need to leave now", mind you it just turned 2 only minutes ago. So rude and disrespectful. Whoever the manager is, have a talk with your security because i was so close having the authorities involved.

o5FdyF8cjNPm-cDS5q7qVQ.text: Love this place! Such a fun atmosphere and so many fun games to play. The staff is super nice also. I love the security guard named Tristan! He's so friendly and makes me want to come back because of how kind and friendly he is!

pfRo2sk0gmPY2FfkGnLvuQ.text: Great place to hang out on a Saturday or Sunday afternoon.  Plenty to do and really good food, staff and atmosphere

27aqsC0xaWqwOzXADusYRw.text: Visiting from Chicago and Michael the bartender and bobby took care of me! Best customer service ever! Cutest bartenders!!!

08sbI02U4sRvAed9lJq6aQ.text: Decent bar in old town. They have a really awesome outdoor patio and usually have pretty good bands playing. Great prices on booze. The reason for the 3 stars are the incredibly disrespectful staff. Doormen have a Napoleon complex and are very confrontational. They will snap on you for breathing wrong. Just because you have a hat that says security on it does not give you the right to berate paying customers. This place should take a good hard look at how their employees represent their business. What I saw and experienced was disgusting. I really enjoy coming to this place but as long as a few select members of the current staff continue to work there I may be taking my business elsewhere.

7FTYfVOLZwSkhDwltSYxaQ.text: I get it, we were 15 min. late to our reservation, we're not from here, we didn't gauge the uber situation right- it happens. But we get to the bar I tell them I made the reservation an hour beforehand, we were late. I let a super nice perfectly quaffed haired security guy know, he says let me see what I can do. A bald headed ass hat security guy comes to scold me about being late, "I need you to understand you won't get a table, I can't guarantee anything. I don't look at reservations made within the last hour." I'm in the service industry, I definitely understand, there is just a better way you can go about it. We picked another spot instead hoping for a friendlier disposition when we checked in.

5MModGXnj2gKeqohiBIkkQ.text: Definitely a fun place to come at night to hang out and grab drinks with some friends! I didn't drink but my friends said their drinks were strong and reasonably priced.   If you're looking for a good hangout with games and a pretty chill atmosphere this is your place!

Zgd8pSjCxo_-WDVIS3bJAQ.text: Boondocks is a fun, popular country bar in Old Town Scottsdale. You can go during the day and order food, but it's more lively at night. The drinks are good, but nothing out of the ordinary.  The outdoor space is very open and inviting. There are large games (corn hole, jenga) and a water feature.  It's a great bar for groups and you don't have to love country music to go.  It's a little off the path of what is considered Old Town Scottsdale, but it's worth the walk. If you're looking for something a little more laid back or somewhere fun to go during the week- this is your place!

JG9GdgoUVXy333ORFXP-Qg.text: (Read in a shatter voice) Star date 12162016: a cool cloudy night with a windy breeze created the perfect atmospheric conditions for a great night. There was live music by a band from a foreign town and beers from mystic town. They had an excellent experience created for the patrons to enjoy. I find, what they call "cornhole," to be one of the lost amusing games. They throw corn-filled bags onto a board and someone declares victory... astonishing.   We have travelled many galaxies, but have never encountered such a place. If these fellow compatriots get  my message then you should make a stop to refuel on some liquid gold at boon.   Update star date 957041.24 (Dec 19th)  Captains log, star date 2116.358 (xmas eve): after a long journey searching the last frontier, my crew was in much need of some relaxation. We found ourselves among Boondocks station located in the Milky Way Galaxy. This time we have found that it was a tranquil night; it must be due to the time of the year. We found ourselves playing some rousing games of pool while kicking back that Irish goodness they call Guinness. As we were about to embark on our journey, we were halted by an icy atmosphere that halted our ships from travel. Nevertheless, Boondocks indeed took care of us. This has become a great space station or, new home, for our rests.

d-c6QU7OAAa2wdjlNVspHQ.text: I'm going to preface this by saying that I hardly ever leave reviews.  Tonight, I walked over to Boondocks with my buddy to catch the late NFL game.  As soon as I walked in the door, the "manager" immediately says "you're not getting in here."  I did a double-take and said huh, why?  He proceeds to state that I look drunk, that my eyes looked red.  (I'm a type 1 diabetic that hasn't had a drink in 4.5 years)   I tell him that I'm not and that I had just finished a cigar with my friend.  He says "your not getting in here."  Again, I tell him that I'm a type 1 diabetic and I show him my Continuous Glucose monitor attached to my stomach and my Insulin.  Around this time, my buddy says hey this is discrimination.    The "manager" says to my buddy "wait, before you get all huffy and puffy and ask for the manager....I am the manager!"  This goes back and forth for a minute until he says he'll let me in.  But then he says "if I see a beer in your hand, your gone."   I didn't get his name, but he worked tonight, Sunday night 11/6/2017.  Once we got in the rest of the staff were awesome...just this guy who was apparently on a power-trip.

ntkjb_JuYyngOwHLkExlCw.text: I always have such an awesome time at Boondocks! This time around, a huge group of us came to get happy hour and sat at one of the couch areas. We constantly had people joining, and our server, Spencer, was always over to check on us and grab our joiner's orders. I am a server, and I know how hard it is to keep track of large parties if people are randomly joining, so I was very impressed. Thank you Spencer for being so on top of everything, we had such a great time!

DgCIUQMHXbIfO4nCIIQjhg.text: Had a great time at the birthday party I was at tonight. Called an Uber and while waiting I asked for a glass of water. Proceeded outside with the cup of water and the bouncer just aggressively took the water without any warning or, "hey man you can't take that outside". I would have kindly walked back inside and drunk the water, but no. It was a total f-u. Parched my whole way home, over a totally aggressive bouncer who could have just been normal for a moment and let me have some water. I could have cared less if I drank it inside or not. You just had to be a jerk, and hence your 1 star. For nothing and you deserve it.

84y3b9mUe5mj331xyudRIQ.text: If you are interested in slowing down on drinking and saving on a Uber ride drink here. If you aren't a servers friend you will get to enjoy chewing on ice as a second drink just isn't even a possibility.  I just don't get It. Such a great place but a staff that must get paid $20 an hour and doesn't work on tips. 3 times I begged them to give them my money, but for some reason they aren't in the market of giving people the opportunity to order more drinks. Thank you for keeping the streets safe.

VPWgijcabABN2aj4vgxhhg.text: The staff in this place clearly don't know what customer service is they were all rude and full of bad attitude. I probably would not go back there anytime soon!

QhNSq66qOmrXVcvA9XHq3g.text: Great food! Great drinks! Cane here kinda late, after 10 on Friday. Live band and great food. Can't see why to go anywhere else. I had the buffalo chicken pita, my husband got the tacos, and we shared the chicken nachos. This place is great!

3BkRxG83ffd93cDM_XaKtw.text: Bartenders are rude, added drinks to our tab that weren't ours. This place isn't worth the time.

HGuhKnUiaYVpMN67__mwpw.text: Look the fries are the bomb dot come. Margaritas were amazing. Great atmosphere great service and lightly battered fried pickles. Love it! Plus made new furry friends. The whole package!

UzSZFaWctBY6scGfg3_6gw.text: The first time I came here was to see the Rhonda Rousi fight. There is plenty of space to sit down in front of a TV. I ordered the wings which were good but I highly recommend the duck fat fries. It can get kind of pricey but it's well worth it.  I also like the location

32udMgwM7fSTrolCnq-RBw.text: If you're looking for a "Scottsdale dive bar," this is the place. Cheap drinks, drinking games, live music, game day hub, and plenty of outside room. This is not a place you'd go on a date, but a big group of friends will do!

AEJzBDkMz0MM8kFQZshnIg.text: I love this bar in Old Town.  The outdoor space is fantastic and spacious.  The multiple bars cut down on wait times to get a drink.  With a great number of TV's, you can almost always find the game you want to watch.  Friday night is definitely the night to go if you want a large, diverse crowd.  Saturday night is fun for just relaxing with friends to get drinks.

DTmu6To7zh68zPFCQVHRgw.text: My first time coming into this place and was pleasantly surprised!   There was only one bartender (Tim) and it was pretty busy, nonetheless he was on it for just about everything. Drinks, food and atmosphere was great, only problem was the misers made it cold once the sun went down but that's not a big problem. I love the patio and now open it is.   I ordered the bbq bacon burger and I was completely satisfied with the burger itself and the crispy perfect fries it came with.  I will certainly return, especially if I'm day drinking!   5/5

photos.caption: Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Happy hour Sauvignon Blanc for $5
Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bacon bbq burger with fries

L9b1UpIYaBE0eGA4lVBDjw.text: This is usually my go to spot as it is a place to get away from the typical club scene in Old Town. With that being said, I was very disappointed in the attitude of the staff this past Saturday night. Having worked within the service industry myself, some days are just busier than others, but at the end of the day if you're not the type of person to keep your cool, maybe it's not the place for you.... one bartender in particular stood out, Sharri (at least that's what it said on our receipt). My friend had asked her if it was cheaper to get a beer or a well vodka drink and she rudely replied that there was a ten dollar minimum anyways. It was a simple question that did not warrant that type of response. There was also a very rude security guard rudely yelling for people to get out of the walk way. Again, I get that fire safety rules must be adhered to, but there's no need to act like it is your job to enact martial law and flash your flash light in people's eyes. Overall, not exactly sure what type of changes the staff have most recently gone through, but I hope they realize that treating customers properly and courteously should be at their upmost top priority. If this does not change, I do not foresee spending any of my money here.

pThzucbKKEd6KVKIzmNQvg.text: Don't bother wasting your time at this place!!! I wish i could give it negative stars because my experience was ABSOLUTELY horrendous. I called 3 weeks prior to my visit, spoke to a guy on the phone who was very friendly and assured my friends Bachelorette party of 16 girls would have to pay no cover, no wait in line and have my name on the list. I reserved this for St Patty's Day because i knew it would be crazy everywhere.  When we got to the door these two door guys who had what we call "chihuahua syndrome" immediately spoke disrespectful and down to me. I told them my name was on the list for 16 girls, they're response without even making eye contact "there's no list" I told them about my phone call and one of the guys told me to meet him around back with $100 cash. "I don't have any cash" then he told me "ATM's Work 24/7" seriously dude? As I'm having this conversation a guy on his own walks out of the bar and this door guy takes the patron by the back of his shoulders and shoves him into the sidewalk screaming "i hope you get hit by a bus" honestly, had it not been a holiday and crazy everywhere else i would've walked away many minutes before. Thankfully another Bachelorette party showed up having the same problem and I had to talk my way into letting 28 cute girls into this bar full of douche bags, assuring them we were about to spend a lot of money inside and we shouldn't have to pay cover. This negotiation took insanely too long and after many disrespectful comments, they finally let us in.  Finally we're in and i need a drink, stat! First bar we walkup to we hear the bartender telling a guy to (excuse my language) "let's go San Fran, stop being a gay pussy and order a drink already" cause he had a SF hat on. Along with that, the bathrooms were THE WORST I've ever experienced, anywhere. Puke all over that never got cleaned up, and girls just basically using the stalls to do drugs. So disappointed and will never. Ever. Return nor recommend this place to ANYONE.

XAQEOsPVTEWzIPPC3YYlhg.text: This bar is quickly becoming one of my favorite spots in Scottsdale. They have plenty of seating and multiple screens for the game. They have one huge projector screen in the middle of the patio. Did I say patio? They have a large outdoor patio with plenty of seating for everyone. Come, relax, have a drink, and enjoys your friends.

noG49VRwSvwhkpA541REbQ.text: Love the vibe here! Really nicely laid out and decorated for the holiday season. Drinks were kinda expensive but not terrible. Highly recommend!

MI-EC-kzYOOQDD6TCrARiA.text: Don't go....they take your credit card....put it in with a hundred more cards...when your ready to go they say their receipt machine isnt working....then charge you a huge bill. I went with my girlfriend...came home and they had charged me a 240 dollar bar tab. What a rip off. So sad because it's was a fun place.

1vRXWtqu1tZ20v4db0RotA.text: I've been here twice every time the female bartender overlooked me for male patrons and had attitude we are ok on this place better funner places in old town to go to with way better service

dBMD71aHEdY1CYgRDIEV0Q.text: I love the layout of this place! There's so much room to hangout, lounge around or play video games and bags. They also have a ping pong table and ski ball. The night was a bit chilly but they had the fire pit going. It was great to sit by the fire and have a couple drinks.   Majority of the crowd was the younger college crowd. I'd say between about 21-30's.  Not an issue at all, everyone was busy with their friends.   The only hiccup we had was our first night grabbing a drink there we had a waitress who left without telling us. We waited and waited and wondered where she was so we could order another drink. Come to find out she had gone home and didn't close us out nor did she have another waiter take care of us.   The second time in we had a wonderful waitress!   I'd definitely hang out here if I lived in Scottsdale.

photos.caption: Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

J_y5TeGjptr3QYOW6ZzZdw.text: Love this bar! They allow you to bring your dogs, and it has a very large patio with a huge TV screen in front. They have live music on the weekends, and it's normally the same band which is not the greatest in my opinion. They have great deals on mimosa buckets on Saturdays and Sundays. Really like this place! Only gave 4 stars because sometimes the waitresses are not very attentive. Overall, one of my favorite places to go and it has a nice laid back vibe.

KJLk3XoxCb_Geh6pJgMwMw.text: Basically felt like I was annoying the bartenders by just asking for a drink. Too cool for school. Sat at table for 30 minutes and no one came to give us a menu or ask how we were doing. There were a ton of people working and hardly anyone in bar but somehow we still got ignored. So went up to bar to get our own drink and a menu. Margarita was awful, tasted bland and diluted. Food was pretty good. Live music was great, singer/guitar player was was best part of bar. Great dive bar if you just get bottled beer and don't care about crap service.

GuWXUdxy0gIdHDltIl4U8A.text: We stop in here every now and then and grab a bite to eat and a drink before we head over to Fox Cigar bar. The burgers here are great! they have a great spicy burger, of which my husband and I loved. The staff is always great, and friendly. Sam is a great guy and is always attentive to whatever we need. They have pool and darts inside, which are fun as well. We like this place quite a bit. Its situated outside of the main old town strip, so you're not getting all the drunken old town people all around you at all times.

oBNGB12bdb4NrNg1G83h5A.text: Spectacular Patio Packed up the wife and the dog in the convertible and took a little spin from Gainey Ranch over to the Boondocks for Taco Tuesday. Huge shaded dog friendly patio with seating for a million. The Taco Trailer parked in front. Ordered 4 different types of tacos including an octopus taco. All spectacular. 2 margaritas, hold the salt please, and chips with guacamole. We did a little people watching and I noticed many young uns looking at us wondering who the geezers were, with no tattoos or pierced body parts, but they have a cool lookin dog! We will be back!

HcQV6fPi-GIzOyDFhRYjaw.text: First off, I'm not one to complain much. But this time I had too. After waiting for a bartender for a few minutes I placed an order for the Sin Burger, I asked for it to be cooked medium well aka NO pink. The burger came out in decent time, but after cutting into it I saw that it was more like a pan seared tuna steak, Unbelievably pink in the middle. I was so hungry and had a guest in from town so I didn't complain, I ate around it. Told the bartender about it and she shrugged her shoulders and said sorry. I know it's not her fault but she could have done something instead of handing me the bill still asking me to pay full price. Boondocks is a great place to hang out and drink but the food service needs attention. I'll still go to the bar but I won't be eating anything other than French fries because you can't fck those up!

MhLkOFYZsWEdcHvEwtZ8KQ.text: I'm not much of an Old Town Scottsdale guy....at all...except when I have to watch a Basketball game at the depressing Majerle's becuase I don't have a TV at home.  Somehow I stumbled upon Boondocks which has formerly been many a bars.    This place is such a surprise.  If you can get past what I call the "Celebrity Service" (Celebrity Service = when the servers think they are celebrities and care more about talking about themselves and what they look like than caring about the people they are serving), you have a winner.    The atmosphere/games are bad ass.  It's very large and spread out.  Clean. And the food was pure shock and awe for me.  From the Moink Burger (maybe my favorite burger in town) to the Carnitas Tacos  to even the Broccoli appetizer....all winners!!   Thank you for this place!!!

WaBv9RGLXDp0AbVcrCvV-A.text: Pretty cool place. Open space with several different bars, games, TV's and so on. Beware of the bartender Barry S. He is a total jerk. He was unnecessarily rude to both me and the girlfriend, and it ruined our evening honestly. The other bartenders seemed fine. A place worth going back to, but I would never approach a bar with Barry S. as the bartender. I just don't know what his problem was.

jOh_XzjUY8Rdz2T_Oy--fA.text: Our office is literally a block away, and every once in a while we like to have a long, relaxing "business" Friday lunch including a beer or three. I called ahead, b/c I brought Clyde, my Weimaraner to work today, and wanted to make sure Boondocks is dog-friendly. Jennifer, the bartender, answered and said, "Absolutely!'  A two-minute walk later, Clyde had a big glass of ice cubes to munch (by request), and then a few minutes later, a big bucket of water  (unsolicited). Jen also brought him 2 dog treats as well. Nice touch! :-)  I'd like to make this all about Clyde, but my chopped salad was fantastic! The dressing was obviously homemade and well seasoned; there was chopped egg blending into the spinach and lettuce mix, portabella mushrooms, roasted tomatoes, and more. I added grilled chicken to the salad, and it was perfect! I couldn't finish the serving, and not for trying. I wouldn't pay $15 for a lunch entree every day (hard NOT to do in Sdl) - but this time, it was worth every dime.   My co-worker had the pork belly sandwich with a huge portion of fries, and he also loved it. He remarked that it was nice to have a menu with a quality and variety of selections worthy of Scottsdale prices.   Clyde perhaps, was not the "perfect" guest, as he barked to be given ice cubes. I was worried about his behavior, but no one seemed to mind...  Will be back! Thanks, Boondocks!

cZB1BieSMuPz_hG9R3eQUg.text: This place sucks I waited 25 minutes for a drink because all of the 3 bartenders clearly couldn't handle having 17 people at the bar. And somehow couldn't see that I was the only person without a drink. Thanks to the baldish bartender who finally asked after I decided I wouldn't buy anything here anymore for what I wanted to drink and jokingly denied me water for a few seconds. oxDeBtBq8Wnn0ore-ptNSw.text: Typical Scottsdale douche bag central.   Bartenders are douches and slouches. Extremely slow and inattentive. The wait for a beer, even on slow days is painful. x_dk5pwC2tg_htaTCUPBGw.text: Boondocks is the most amazing place in Scottsdale. I had my engagement party there this past weekend and it was the best time I've had in a long time in Scottsdale. Scottsdale tends to be snobby and over the top, but Boondocks was the exact opposite. Scottsdale has needed a place like Boondocks for years and finally it has arrived. Everyone was friendly, atmosphere was open with plenty of room to spread out and enjoy your own space, food was fantastic with a wide variety and the best part was the live band and games. We played bags, beer pong, table tennis and dances the night away. We are from Chicago and all bars are like this out there so it was nice to see something in Scottsdale that has the same vibe as our home sweet home Chicago!  Thank you Boondocks for a night of wonderful memories!

yqmFI1Xvmp_zoya_00JxAg.text: Boondocks has replaced what was once Spanish Fly, and has made fantastic use of what was once wasted pool space. I love the patio; games and performance space on the perimeter and plenty of seating. This place also comes with some of your favorite familiar industry faces which adds to the vibe. Alas, let's dig into the food shall we?   The starters have a versatile range, but the Mac and cheese catches my eye. First, I've never understood Mac and cheese on an appetizer menu. A side? Absolutely. An entree? Sure. An appetizer? I guess I won't argue but it seems kind of off. Anyhow, I get the Mac and cheese that touts 4 cheeses, herb bread crumbs, green chiles and bacon. Yowza that's a lot. I'm expecting a powerful flavor combo, but it falls flat on my palette. I'm in need of a good strong central cheese flavor and less of the frilly add ons. I fear it may be a roux, which can really be tough for Mac and cheese because it can swallow up the flavor of the cheeses.   Moving on I try the St. Pattys burger. I asked for it medium and it came to me well, however it is still fantastic! The Irish cheddar, with the mustard was just the right amount of zing juxtaposed with the fresh lettuce and tomato. Despite being well done, neither flavor nor moisture was lost on the combination of meats in this burger. So so good. Equally delish was the potato salad side dish. Fingerling potatoes in a heavenly creamy sauce with red peppers. I absolutely love red peppers in this potato salad to add that extra kick.   I'm looking forward to coming back to Boondocks to enjoy their patio. While I'm at it I plan to try some of their tacos, and get into some of the red pepper hummus.

YfkRisDIjKJrSYDdt6_v1A.text: Reserved a table. It's 8:57 and they ripped the cushions out from under us. I'm laughing because this is so insane. Bar doesn't close until 2AM. We are sitting on sofas without any cushions. We will make it work, but good lord what a joke.

xu8pG7o9Hln01oMkf_ct6A.text: Day drinking was fun!  Great place for all ages!  The only complaint was that we tried to get a minor in to eat and they said they were too busy to let her in at 500pm. Four of us were ok to serve since 12pm but wouldn't let her join us for some food at 5pm. Going somewhere else after spending money here!

PVahqEjv0rI8hvyVQc4_xg.text: My buddy literally got kicked out for no reason. We were walking through a crown of people on New Year's Eve and a bouncer just escorted him out. Literally no reason. After some talking to the bouncers they let him back in but because of the set back we were very annoyed.

48dKVyE23-JHtazIZFIXIg.text: HH review. Had the Brussels sprouts-delicious. Spouse  had the tacos, not bad. The guacamole  app was quite good. I'd prob order wine off the regular menus next time. I didn't like the HH cab

photos.caption: Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. HH wine came from the little individual serving bottles.  Was just meh. Glasses were really water spotted, kind of off-putting
Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. HH Brussels Sprouts $5. Plenty of them and very tasty with lots of cheese and not greasy.

1QdOgt2zCKvXIcrn0W1Z7g.text: This bars good, maybe great. It perfectly fits a gap in the Old Town scene that was left when The Lodge shut down. It's outdoors, the food is good, they have games if that's your thing, and they draw a good crowd.  But they have this terrible bouncer. He's a tall guy, probably 300 pounds, he's not really muscular, has a buzzed head of hair, darker complexion.   Friday night 3/23 I had a bad experience. I was just waiting in line to get in, but when I showed him my ID with my old picture from 2002, he said I should "cut my hair like in my ID picture, it looks stupid now". I appreciate a good joke, but this wasn't a joke. He was just taking a dig at me.  Then... once I meet up with my buddies on the inside, my other friend (who has a shaved head and is slightly balding) tells me that the same bouncer gave him a hard time too... for no reason mind you. just said: "Looks like you're balding"  I'm not going back there. I'm going to suggest to my friends that they not go back there. I'm going to suggest that strangers not go there either.  Just because of one bad attitude.  Yelp isn't just a place for people to complain, look at my reviews, there are plenty of positive ones. But I think it's a great place for businesses to look at what's working and what's not. This guy is definitely not.

gK7CxHnD3WWNkc4S3W0XuA.text: Tonight we went to the clubs in old town for my sisters bachelorette. We wanted something more low key. We headed to boondocks, and my sister in law and I had to pee. We don't believe in gender, and a dude came out of the men's room and said it's empty in there. We went in and quickly came back out after peeing. We were greeted by 4 security guards, myself and my pregnant sister in law. They confiscated her water and kicked us out, without letting us touch base with our group. Literally, what is the point of bathrooms if they aren't meant to be used, and why does it matter that I peed in a toilet designated men! Don't support this business!

dMSSWJE4TJE5omdjfDcQsw.text: Great place if you are out and about with no belongings. If you have been shopping in Old Town, they will not let you bring in your bags and make you leave them at the front without a hostess. We only stayed for one drink to ensure we got our stuff at the door.

QlRgyipD-BZDdewDr4VVWw.text: Very fun.... has it all.  Literally!  Great prices... band... every bar game there is... and I gotta honestly say I'm coming back!

hGjjWWk25FV9WKYYoCX_Eg.text: Didn't expect much for service here.  Sat at a table for 20 minutes and no one even came to our table.  After I stood on the table yelling does anyone work here, "Sarah" came over with a snotty attitude saying she was real busy.  90% of the table were empty what a joke!

PZMlP95SomZG4ZlbVgZb4Q.text: Such friendly service and great food. My grandmother came down to visit and we decided to check it out for a nice lunch and couldn't have been happier with our decision. We got to sit were we wanted and we had a very nice and helpful waitress. She would check up on us and refilled our drinks without us having to ask also giving us a to go cup. For a bar focused grill the food was very good!! I'm not sure how it is at night but for a nice lunch before a day of shopping and walking its a relaxing and enjoyable choice! Defiantly will go back another time at night to check it out!

DdVmKAjbaLJDdMwVNHfW8Q.text: Visited this bar/restaurant based on a review in the AZ Republic.  The Republic had a better experience than we did, although we had a nice experience.  Had picnic table and Tiki Hut decor.  Cute.  Drinks were excellent, as was the service.  Our appetizers, however, were served cold.  The bar seemed understaffed.    Nonetheless, we'll try this place again.

nf-zrmg1sJvxwcJvkSlFlA.text: Should not be averaging 3.5 stars.  If you want fist pumping steroid fest, go down the road.  Great place to chill in Old Town without over paying for great food and drinks.  My only suggestion is they should bring back the saganaki and beer brats that were so popular.

WyT-7yr6fkH3sRGup3kHAQ.text: This place never disappoints! The bartenders are very accommodating and make the drinks how YOU want it. The management genuinely cares about our visit(s) and makes sure we're taken care of. Me and my husband left El Hefe due to seriotusly bad service, not too far from Boondocks and truly got the service at Boondocks that we love. The food was awesome and our drinks were made for our pleasure. It's a great environment to hang out and meet new people!

AopwIrPJUVIZRAFVRE2Uug.text: *NOTE* This review is coming coming far too late, and I apologize to the restaurant for taking so long to post this!  My husband and I had been driving for days and had finally reached our Old Town destination. We wanted someplace casual that had good food and drinks, someplace we could come down from our "road buzz" without a bunch of formality.  We could not have picked a better place to go. Boondocks was perfect!   We sat at the bar and had excellent service with Kaitlyn, who was friendly, prompt and mixed a mean cocktail, exactly what you wish every bartender/server was like . For dinner, we chose several appetizers. The huge standout was the Duck Fat Fries. They were truly amazing, hot, crisp and light with perfect seasoning and dipping sauces. For those who don't like duck (I don't prefer it either), don't worry, they don't taste "ducky" at all!   I strongly recommend this place. They have lots of great outdoor seating areas and games too. Boondocks offered a great dining experience for my husband and I but it sure would have been fun to have a bunch of friends there with us for an epic night of drinks and games!

5qd_AjkUFRNDJeom9tAd7Q.text: To be fair this is more of a 3.5 with serious potential. The atmosphere is great... Ping pong, corn hole, pool table, darts and music all make for a great time! The menu isn't bad either. I've had the chopped salad, grilled cheese bites, "free bird" chicken entree and the nachos. All great bar food! The problems: The wait time for food (I've been a few times now and waited 30+ minutes every time). The service in general is slow but this place is brand new and I don't see these issues being permanent. All in all it's a really fun place to hang out!

yh0mp459m1BuoNkjsIfebA.text: Great spot heading into the summer season. The patio is great and dog friendly and is still nice and cool. It was fun playing ping pong while we were waiting for our food. Very excited to have another patio bar in old town.

rwYwVUOv_fysAoD7Bf-wQw.text: Brussel Sprouts w/goat cheese, Blue Cheese Burger, Hummus, Shrimp Ceviche, Pork Belly Sandwich W/Bacon, Macaroni and Cheese, Duckfat fries, are just a few of the delicious items I had on my last visit to Boondocks. This place is great. Service was great,  ambiance is great, music is great, drinks are great,  what else can I say. I will be visiting this place again very soon to try the multitude of selections on their menu!  Everyone should check this place out.  Daily specials are awesome!  Happy Hour is legit! Weekend entertainment is free and exciting!! Don't forget there canned beer to help out a local charity!!!

FlGCdPJX9tNPqsSLfVLidA.text: Good place for a cocktail and some food after work.  Food is made with quality ingredients, something hard to find at a good place to drink as well. I recommend trying it out, PLT is delicious,  as well as the mac n cheese. Also the quinoa salad is a  perfect healthy snack. Check it out!!

u0paOvap2flugOJsInFQAQ.text: Been here before late night and loved it! Great food and awesome staff! Came for happy hour and was extremely disappointed. The food was under cooked and the bar staff was rude and inattentive. I strongly recommend rehiring the day staff.

MmdrQ0TEImE7vi4oTOfPsg.text: Came here for lunch on a Friday afternoon and it was wonderful. The service was great and he made sure to have heaters out for us while we were playing games outside. The food was great and my whole party enjoyed what they ordered. I had the Mac and cheese and it was so yummy! There are so many fun games to play and a cool place to hang out! Highly recommend!

WRn6JFSp-TqkWF91RqYOuA.text: This place is really awesome! It's my new favorite place! The wings are amazing, you have to try them! There is ping pong and cornhole to play. Such a great environment with lots of room to move around. Can't wait to go there today!

th_fV-a9WZ0q_5RiNxsdzw.text: Fun place a little expensive 6 $ draft beer's but lots of fun stuff and a good atmosphere

G1-HO5EE4V03BJVRz0aHNQ.text: Sadly this bar is very typical of Scottsdale bars that charge high end prices for food but come up very short. Come in for Monday Football with a friend. Waitress came over within 3 minutes and suggested that it was Cheesy Monday, half off Mac n Cheese or Cheese Bites. Call me simple, who doesn't like a Mac N Cheese plate? Order a Orange Blossom, which tasted flat? I took a couple of more sips and yes indeed it was flat, waitress comes over after 10 minutes, and I tell her that the beer tastes flat, she tells me beer can't go flat? Having thrown a couple of keggers, I know otherwise. She tells me that she is going to ask them to change the keg (yeah right). I got another Orange Blossom and it still tastes flat. I deal with it. Waiting for the Mac N Cheese, I notice that the place isn't that bad of a place to hang out, it could be maybe be a decent alternative to The Lodge, this was before my next experience.  So the Mac N Cheese comes out, The first thing I noticed is that it comes in 2 small skillets, 1 bowl would make clean up a lot easier, but hey I like simple things. My friend and I notice that there is no real cheese sauce on the Mac N Cheese, so we take a bite to see if maybe it is at the bottom. Nope, there is a slim sauce on this so called "Mac N Cheese". We ask the waitress, if we ordered Mac N Cheese or some noodles? She tells us, "we"ll you don't want too much sauce it will ruin it". Nope its already ruined. As the menu stated "Mac N Cheese with cheese sauce, bacon and bread crumbs" The bacon was fake and bacon that comes in a shaker, which I didn't think they made anymore. She brought out some more sauce, which made it ok. How can you ruin Mac n Cheese? Ask Boondocks because they butchered it. Upon getting our bill, I noticed that the waitress charged us $1.00 for the cheese sauce. Classy move Boondocks. I wont be coming back here, ever again. The menu prices don't justify the food they serve you, I can imagine how the $18 ribs are? No Thanks....

syg6gPtJT_SmUE5weNZyQA.text: I love the new concept of this place. Best place to relax and enjoy a real good time. I would recommend this play to everyone.

zgqmyc1U1xmtvgtOSYOPMA.text: Managers were rude to our group. Overpriced drinks and food, misleading pricing, Bill was predictively wrong and overcharged. Won't be back.

lNtu5qsux4CruTgMnis9tg.text: First I would like to say the entertainment was great. Good live band. But everything else fell short of good. Service was extremely slow, about ten minutes for two drinks that were literally just liquor with a splash of mixer. If you asked for anything expect to ask two or three times before you received it. The food, the food was just straight bad. Succulent chicken was far from succulent. Burnt small piece of chicken, maybe 3oz at most, and I mean burnt. Almost no whipped goat cheese and a piece of canned red pepper. There were five onion rings, far from a side. And neither were seasoned, the chicken screamed for salt. The chicken wings were bland and needed seasoning too, although the buffalo wasn't too too bad. Barbecue was definitely no go. Tacos were basic and they forgot the cotija cheese and without it they needed salt too. Wouldn't recommend this place to anyone, to be honest and doubt I'll be back, not in an area that offers much better food and service.

v5Ra-Q_zV_KxkRybrnS6EQ.text: Horrible customer service. Me and my girlfriend went their for the first time and, it will he the last. The place was not busy at all for a weekend night and thought it would be a good place to have a quick drink. After waiting at the bar for a few minutes (which is normal) the female bartender came up and asked us what we wanted. My friend asked a question about the ping pong tables they had, she abruptly answered her and then walked away without taking our order. The bartended then proceeded to service the men at the bar asking if they were ok and if they ended anything else.We tried to get her attention because we were ready to order but she never came back to us or even looked our way! We both stood there confused because we were ready to order and just because we asked a question before we order didn't give her the right to completely disregard us as customers. I don't know if it was because we were female and she didn't think she would get a good tip from us or if she just wanted the men's attention. Who knows! I will never go back to that bar and will not hesitate to let my friends know about the bad customer service either.

GvserZnqO6sbud4T_NgOxA.text: Great place for birthdays or events! Bartenders are really nice, food is great, & the atmosphere is ! Get the Duck Fat Fries

fhwvXZQiuozzlF8Px5hFUw.text: This is a wonderful bar if you enjoy being physically threatened by bouncers simply for calmly standing in line and handing over your ID when asked. I was stone cold sober, and had not said a word except "hello," and the man told me "I will hunt you down and kick your ass myself if another person comes in using your ID." This was my first time in the establishment, it was 7pm, myself and all my companions are over 30, and I provided a current state ID. I was speechless!  If that warm reception is not enough for you, go inside for bland food, drinks that never arrive but you have to pay for, filthy bathrooms, bigoted bartenders (I heard multiple slurs thrown around), oh the list goes on.   Pay attention to all of the reviews about the staff being overly aggressive to women and people of color. Boondocks is a garbage place for garbage people. If you hate women and black people, you will love Boondocks!

gBoZBVeA4YVyQChdbSd3Pg.text: What a fun bar to be at! Stopped by and they had a bumpin' live band and $15 mimosa buckets on Sundays! Talk about a recipe for a good time. It's in a really nice area and everyone appeared to be having a great time!

photos.caption: Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Live band

YgLOmpejAZfvSWuEBwWRzQ.text: I love Boondock's bar scene, but tonight I am extremely disappointed in the food I got delivered.   First of all, they handed our food to the wrong DoorDasher so they had to make our order from scratch and send it out again. We got our food 2 hours after ordering it despite being only 0.8miles away from the bar.   Secondly, half of our food was a mess. The Pulled Pork BBQ Sandwich had NO barbecue sauce. Their DoorDash menu said the nachos had mole sauce and no corn, but we got zero mole sauce. Thank goodness the Brussels sprouts & garlic fries were amazing, they are the only reason this review isn't 1 star.

Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Garlic Fries

LGJovstPAPEufoG1uZ0tzQ.text: I have come here a lot to drink after hours and have always had a good time with really decently priced drinks unlike the rest of Scottsdale. Today, we decided to grab some lunch and beers on a Sunday to suppress the Sunday Scaries for another few hours. I ordered the crispy chicken sandwich and man this baby was juicy, tasty and filling. Had all the toppings, and side of fries with no extra cost like somebody *cough cough* cold beers and cheeseburgers. I underestimated this place and it overdelivered. Good for them, I will definitely be coming back for food and will be recommending this place to friends. Thank you!

photos.caption: Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Crispy chicken sandwich and zdawg

1sWYgyljebmCk_3pdm9nDw.text: I can't say too much else besides take a look at the north west side of the bar. The "back bar."  There are cockroaches crawling up and down every wall outside, including in-between the floorboards. It's disgusting to fact that I can't even joke about it as if it was one bug. They truly have a bug infestation. And it's nasty as hell. I will never go here again after seeing the employees stomping on the bugs on the back bar as if it was a fun game. Dude, you serve food here....

B0AVTkIyGt9qqYTy4fruBA.text: Sitting with my girlfriend....bartender had no problem, I wish I had his name because he expressed that there was no issue more than once. Regardless, I was asked to leave the bar with no explanation and was aggressively pushed out of the bar. I will never be back to boondocks and I am filing a lawsuit against the owners, which is a shame because they were not aware of the issue. Unfortunately, they are at fault for employing an individual that is not cognizant of the issues in the operations of the bar. Update! Lawyer is on retainer.

photos.caption: Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. ^^^shoving my girlfriend! If you want a bar that abuses minorities, you found your place!!!!

7bv8eTgyqJtZpJXOAkT6kA.text: This is my favorite bar in old town Scottsdale.  I have never had a bad experience at the Boonie....and the bar staff, especially Matt & Senada, and everyone else there on Thursdays are great!  The food is very good and the drink specials are terrific.  This is my first choice to hang out at and its cool to do a Saturday or Sunday day drink here!

v3fFNzzU2DgASqLeoFcUaQ.text: Just walked in just now. Bouncer? Told us to sit anywhere so we sat at the high top table in front of indoor bar. We waited 8min and nothing before leaving. It's 1:30pm and not busy and I assuming the 3 or 4 people standing at the bar talking are the servers? Idk if you're supposed to walk up and order at bar and grab the menu from someone?? Not sure but we just checked into our hotel after a 6hr drive and just wanted to eat so I guess we'll find somewhere else to grab something. Does anyone else know how you order or get food there?

JA2kLfBNBL9yK8Bx8lIABw.text: I always come here during the week. Great staff drinks are amazing!! Fun place, one of my fav bars in old town

5Ylv_WEZCWbwUksuAyQeyQ.text: Super fun place to go hang out especially when the weather is nice to be outside!  Classic hole in the wall feel for the bar and a welcome getaway from the typical Scottsdale type clubs/bars in the area.    I could chill on their patio for hours with good friends and decently priced drinks.  Love this place

AIH0V5hghMO2KsqfrgFYPA.text: If you're coming here on a Saturday night, I would recommend getting there very very early as the line is massive! Didn't end up going in Saturday night because of how long the line was but it looked like a lot of fun. We decided to come back for dinner and to watch the end of the warriors/rockets game which was had pretty cool setting. There was a ton of open patio, tables, and TVs. Pool tables and shuffle board as well. Had a ragae band playing live music pretty much the entire time we were there.   FOOD ORDERED: DOCK RIBS/ SWEET POTATO FRIES: half off on Sundays which was an additional plus to them being fall off the bone good! BBQ sauce had a bit of a sweetness to it which was different but really enjoyed. The sweet potato fries with ranch and BBQ sauce was really good as well. Didn't imagine the ribs to be as good as they were. I would definitely recommend them if you're a ribs fan! Cole slaw was mediocre at best.   SERVICE: Wasn't bad! The bouncer was nice and the hostess and servers were really cool and on top of the service. I thought everything was decently priced especially for the wings being half off.

photos.caption: Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Boondocks Patio & Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

_vYqIHewJtderUWhyJBFXw.text: I was upset when getting my bill. Nobody asks prices for every drink they have, right you assume the menu prices are accurate.  So i ordered a tap beer. Didn't care for it too much, and so I order the margarita cause i see its $5. When i got my bill I was upset to find out I was charged $6.00 not $5 and I had 2. So when the bartender asks if everything was ok. I said not really you guys have charged me more. Her response was its only a $1.50. I didn't even finish my drink I was so upset.. I've never had a bar try to bait and switch before and she was just concerned about her tip. I won't be here again because I don't trust they will honor their prices. Who does that ??
